auth.loginDescription: Antre kle sekrè ou pou aksede liy asistans lan
auth.loginError: Echèk koneksyon. Verifye kle ou epi eseye ankò.
auth.securityNote: Kle ou pa janm kite aparèy ou

dashboard.title: Tablo
dashboard.breakDescription: Ou pa p resevwa apèl pandan pòz la

callSettings.title: Paramèt Apèl
callSettings.description: Konfigure konpòtman liy atant apèl ak paramèt mesaj vokal.
callSettings.queueTimeoutDescription: Konbyen tan moun ki rele yo tann anvan yo voye nan mesaj vokal (segonn).
callSettings.voicemailMaxDescription: Longè maksimòm anrejistreman pou mesaj vokal (segonn).

notes.title: Nòt Apèl
notes.notePlaceholder: Antre nòt ou sou apèl sa a...
notes.encryptionNote: Nòt yo chifre de bout an bout
notes.noSearchResults: Pa gen nòt ki koresponn ak rechèch ou a
notes.exportEncrypted: Ekspò chifre — dechifre ak kle nsec ou
notes.activeCallNote: Nòt ki tache ak apèl aktif ou a

transcription.title: Transkripsyon
transcription.enableForCalls: Aktive transkripsyon pou apèl mwen yo
transcription.disableForCalls: Dezaktive transkripsyon pou apèl mwen yo
transcription.allowOptOutDescription: Lè dezaktive, volontè yo pa ka refize transkripsyon apèl
transcription.managedByAdmin: Transkripsyon jere pa administratè w la

shifts.title: Orè Ouvèti
shifts.fallbackDescription: Volontè sa yo resevwa apèl lè pa gen ouvèti planifye

volunteers.title: Volontè
volunteers.name: Non
volunteers.inviteGenerated: Envitasyon kreye! Pataje kle sekrè a an sekirite.
volunteers.secretKeyWarning: Kle sa a ap parèt yon sèl fwa. Pataje li an sekirite avèk volontè a.
volunteers.invalidPhone: Nimewo telefòn envalid. Itilize fòma E.164 (egz. +50937123456)

webauthn.title: Kle aksè
webauthn.description: Sèvi ak biyometri oswa PIN aparèy ou pou konekte san kle sekrè ou.
webauthn.noKeys: Pa gen kle aksè anrejistre ankò.
webauthn.label: Non kle aksè (egz. "Telefòn Mwen")
webauthn.policyDescription: Egzije kle aksè pou gwoup itilizatè. Itilizatè ki pa gen kle aksè ap resevwa demann pou konfigire youn.
webauthn.browserNotSupported: Navigatè ou pa sipòte kle aksè.

banList.title: Lis Blokaj
banList.confirmBan: Èske ou sèten ou vle bloke nimewo sa a?
banList.confirmUnban: Èske ou sèten ou vle debloke nimewo sa a?
banList.bulkImportDescription: Kole nimewo telefòn yo (youn pa liy)

auditLog.title: Jounal Odit
auditLog.noEntries: Pa gen antre nan jounal la

ivrAudio.title: Mesaj vwa
ivrAudio.description: Anrejistre odyo pèsonalize pou mesaj IVR. Itilize tèks-a-lapawòl lè pa gen anrejistreman.

ivr.title: Meni lang IVR
ivr.description: Chwazi ki lang moun k ap rele yo tande nan meni telefòn nan.

spam.title: Pwoteksyon Anti-Spam
spam.voiceCaptchaDescription: Egzije moun ki rele yo antre yon nimewo owaza avan yo konekte
spam.rateLimitingDescription: Limite apèl repete nan menm nimewo a
spam.maxCallsPerMinute: Maksimòm apèl pa minit pa nimewo

callHistory.title: Istorik Apèl
callHistory.noResults: Pa gen apèl ki koresponn ak rechèch ou a
callHistory.searchPlaceholder: Chèche pa nimewo telefòn oswa volontè...

profile.spokenLanguages: Lang ou ka pran apèl ladan yo
profile.spokenLanguagesHelp: Chwazi tout lang ou ka pran apèl ladan yo.

phone.hint: Chwazi peyi a epi antre nimewo

settings.title: Paramèt Kont
settings.hubDescription: Paramèt ki afekte tout hub liy asistans lan.
settings.transcriptionDescription: Sèvi ak IA pou transkri apèl. Ka dezaktive pa volontè.
settings.notificationsDescription: Konfigure kijan ou resevwa alèt apèl ki antre
settings.playRingtone: Jwe sonnri pou apèl ki antre
settings.playRingtoneDescription: Jwe yon son lè yon apèl ap sonnen
settings.browserNotificationsDescription: Montre yon notifikasyon sistèm pou apèl ki antre
settings.callPreferenceDescription: Chwazi kijan ou resevwa apèl ki antre
settings.callPrefPhoneDesc: Resevwa apèl sou nimewo telefòn ou
settings.callPrefBrowserDesc: Reponn apèl dirèkteman nan navigatè ou via WebRTC
settings.callPrefBothDesc: Sonnen ni telefòn ni navigatè an menm tan
settings.webrtcNotConfigured: Apèl nan navigatè pa disponib. Admin ou bezwen aktive WebRTC nan paramèt founisè telefoni a.

session.expiredDescription: Sesyon ou expire. Ou ka rekonekte oswa konekte ankò.

confirm.transcriptionEnable: Aktive transkripsyon apèl pou tout volontè? Sa a itilize IA pou transkri apèl an tan reyèl.
confirm.transcriptionDisable: Dezaktive transkripsyon apèl? Volontè yo pa p gen apèl yo transkri otomatikman ankò.
confirm.captchaEnable: Aktive CAPTCHA vwa? Moun ki rele yo ap dwe antre yon nimewo owaza avan yo konekte.
confirm.captchaDisable: Dezaktive CAPTCHA vwa? Moun ki rele yo ap konekte dirèkteman san verifikasyon.
confirm.rateLimitEnable: Aktive limitasyon frekans? Apèl repete nan menm nimewo a ap bloke tanporèman.
confirm.rateLimitDisable: Dezaktive limitasyon frekans? Pa p gen limit sou apèl repete nan menm nimewo a.

telephonyProvider.title: Telephony Provider
telephonyProvider.description: Configure the telephony provider used for handling calls
telephonyProvider.phoneNumberHelp: The phone number callers dial (E.164 format)
telephonyProvider.bridgeCallbackUrlHelp: URL where the ARI bridge sends webhooks to this app

providerDescriptions.twilio: Industry-standard cloud telephony. Easiest to set up with excellent documentation.
providerDescriptions.signalwire: Twilio-compatible API at lower cost. Drop-in replacement for most use cases.
providerDescriptions.vonage: Global telephony provider with strong international coverage and competitive pricing.
providerDescriptions.plivo: Cost-effective cloud telephony with a clean API. Good for budget-conscious deployments.
providerDescriptions.asterisk: Self-hosted PBX for maximum control and lowest per-minute cost. Requires server setup.

telephonyProvider.notImplemented: This provider is not yet implemented. Please use Twilio or SignalWire.
telephonyProvider.webrtcConfigHelp: Aktive apèl nan navigatè pou volontè yo. Mande plis enfòmasyon koneksyon.
telephonyProvider.apiKeySidHelp: Jenere yon API Key nan konsol Twilio/SignalWire ou
telephonyProvider.twimlAppSidHelp: Kreye yon TwiML App avèk URL vwa ki dirije nan webhook ou

customFields.title: Chan Nòt Pèsonalize
customFields.description: Defini chan siplemantè ki parèt sou fòm nòt la
customFields.deleteConfirm: Efase chan sa a? Nòt ki gen chan sa a deja ap kenbe done yo.

notifications.promptText: Enable notifications to get alerted when calls come in.
notifications.statusDefault: Browser notifications have not been enabled yet.
notifications.statusDenied: Notifications are blocked. Update your browser's site settings to enable them.
notifications.statusUnsupported: Your browser does not support notifications.

pwa.installText: Install this app for quick access and a better experience.

pinChallenge.title: Verify Your Identity
pinChallenge.description: Enter your PIN to continue with this action.
pinChallenge.maxAttempts: Maximum attempts exceeded. Key has been wiped.

rcs.title: RCS Channel
rcs.description: Google RCS Business Messaging for rich messaging experiences.
rcs.fallbackToSmsDesc: Send via SMS when RCS is unavailable for the recipient.

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Yo envite ou pou w vin volontè, {{volunteerName}}
onboarding.backupDescription: Ekri kle rekiperasyon sa a epi kenbe li an sekirite. Se sèl fason pou rekipere kont ou sou yon nouvo aparèy.
onboarding.recoveryKeyWarning: Ekri sa a epi estoke li an sekirite. Si ou pèdi PIN ou ak kle sa a, kont ou pa ka rekipere.
onboarding.storageTipsTitle: Kijan pou estoke kle rekiperasyon w
onboarding.storageTip1: Anrejistre l nan yon jesyonè modpas (1Password, Bitwarden, elatriye)
onboarding.storageTip2: Estoke l sou yon aparèy pèsonèl ke ou sèlman gen aksè
onboarding.storageTip3: Ekri l epi kenbe l nan yon kote ki an sekirite fizikman
onboarding.backupAcknowledge: Mwen te anrejistre kle rekiperasyon mwen nan yon kote ki an sekirite

pin.createDescription: Chwazi yon PIN 6 chif pou pwoteje kle ou sou aparèy sa a
pin.confirmDescription: Antre PIN ou ankò pou konfime
pin.mismatch: PIN yo pa menm. Eseye ankò.

deviceLink.title: Lye Aparèy
deviceLink.description: Konfigire aparèy sa a lè w lye li ak kont ou ki deja egziste.
deviceLink.instructions: Sou aparèy prensipal ou, ale nan Paramèt epi louvri seksyon 'Aparèy Lye'. Apre sa, eskane kòd QR la oswa antre kòd ki parèt la a.
deviceLink.scanFromPrimary: Eskane kòd sa a nan Paramèt aparèy prensipal ou.
deviceLink.orEnterCode: Oswa antre kòd sa a sou aparèy prensipal ou:
deviceLink.expiresIn5: Kòd sa a ekspire nan 5 minit.
deviceLink.linkSuccessDesc: Kont ou disponib sou aparèy sa a kounye a. Mete yon PIN pou pwoteje li.
deviceLink.linkExpired: Sesyon lyaj la ekspire. Tanpri eseye ankò.
deviceLink.linkedDevicesDesc: Lye yon nouvo aparèy ak kont ou lè w antre kòd apwovizyonman li.
deviceLink.linkFromPrimary: Pou lye yon nouvo aparèy, louvri aplikasyon Hotline sou nouvo aparèy la, tape 'Lye aparèy sa a', epi antre kòd ki parèt la a anba a.
deviceLink.invalidCode: Kòd apwovizyonman envalid. Tanpri eskane kòd QR la oswa kopye kòd konplè a.
deviceLink.verifySASDesc: Compare this code with the code shown on your primary device.
deviceLink.verifySASPrimary: Verify this code matches the code on the new device:
deviceLink.compareCodes: Both devices must show the same code. If the codes don't match, do NOT proceed — an attacker may be present.
deviceLink.sasMismatch: Security codes did not match. The linking session has been aborted for your safety. Please try again.
deviceLink.decryptFailed: Failed to decrypt key from primary device. Please try again.

blasts.title: Message Blasts
blasts.noBlasts: No blasts yet. Create one to get started.
blasts.selectOrCreate: Select a blast or create a new one
blasts.fillRequired: Please fill in name and message
blasts.doubleOptInDesc: Require subscribers to confirm before receiving blasts

contacts.title: Kontak
contacts.description: Wè istwa entèraksyon inifye atravè apèl, konvèsasyon ak rapò.
